block.p: Baseball National League CINCINNATI REDS -- Placed Benito Santiago, catcher, on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 8. Optioned John Courtright and Matt Grott, pitchers, to Indianapolis of the American Association. HOUSTON ASTROS -- Activated Chris Donnels, infielder, from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned Ricky Gutierrez, shortstop, to Tucson of the Pacific Coast League. MONTREAL EXPOS -- Signed Kash Beauchamp, outfielder, and assigned him to Harrisburg of the Eastern League. Football National Football League ARIZONA CARDINALS -- Named Craig Cason scout. CINCINNATI BENGALS -- Announced the retirement of Tom Waddle, wide receiver. Hockey National Hockey League N.H.L. -- Fined New Jersey Devils left wing Mike Peluso $1,000 for throwing an elbow at Boston Bruins center Jozef Stumpel during Wednesday night's playoff game. EDMONTON OILERS -- Announced they purchased the remaining 50 percent share of their A.H.L. affiliate from Sydney, Nova Scotia, and are now sole owners of the team.
